body.p:
Richmond 12 June '61
Hon B. Magoffin Gov.
Dear Sir

About 6 weeks ago I sent you a petition signed by about 20 good citizens, to remit a fine of thirty five dollars, against Joshua Baker, for afray & Breach of the Peace found at the June term of Madison Court in 1857 This is a cace calling for Executive clemency he is a poor & industrious man. He was incarcerated Feb 1861 & I became his surity to relieve him from prison.
Hopeing you will give this early attention.

Petition
Respite 12 Mo
Isd Mar 24
Madison Cir. Ct
$35. } Breach
Joshua Baker
